amendment.description: To provide for a manager's amendment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1087 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 3. Record Vote Number: 211.

action.text: Amendment SA 1087 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3727-3728) To provide for a manager's amendment.
